DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 14 Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of pharyngoesophageal segment opening in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No distension with total obstruction of flow

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No distension with total obstruction of flow
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no distension of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing with total obstruction of flow.

Concepts.longName: No Distension of Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of no distension of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing with total obstruction of flow.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Minimal distension/minimal duration; marked obstruction of flow

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Minimal distension/minimal duration; marked obstruction of flow
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of minimal distension or minimal duration of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing; marked obstruction of flow.

Concepts.longName: Minimal Distension or Minimal Duration of Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of minimal distension or minimal duration of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing; marked obstruction of flow.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Partial distension/partial duration; partial obstruction of flow

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Partial distension/partial duration; partial obstruction of flow
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of partial distension or partial duration of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing; partial obstruction of flow.

Concepts.longName: Partial Distension or Partial Duration of Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of partial distension or partial duration of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing; partial obstruction of flow.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Complete distension and complete duration; no obstruction of flow

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Complete distension and complete duration; no obstruction of flow
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of complete distension and complete duration of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing; no obstruction of flow.

Concepts.longName: Complete Distension and Complete Duration of Pharyngoesophageal Segment Opening During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of complete distension and complete duration of pharyngoesophageal segment opening during swallowing; no obstruction of flow.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
